product_name: Von Zipper MindGlo Booker Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The VonZipper MindGlo Booker Sunglasses feature sleek, sporty 3-layer lenses and a scratch-resistant hard coating for all your outdoor activities. Tort Satin frames come with polarized gray lenses for neutral, true color perception in bright light. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Lightweight nylon Grilamid frames offer a consistent fit, flexibility and impact resistance at any temperature. The VonZipper MindGlo Booker Sunglasses feature stainless-steel optical hinges.
short_description: The VonZipper MindGlo Booker Sunglasses feature sleek, sporty 3-layer lenses and a scratch-resistant hard coating for all your outdoor activities.
